title: Seoul Bap NYC Food & Drink Menu — Seoul Bap
text: dinner menu K-TAPAS $20 KOREAN FRIED CHICKEN Seasoned and battered bite-sized chicken thigh pieces, double fried $20 $25 BEEF TARTARE Premium, tender raw beef marinated in traditional Korean flavors, served with crispy quinoa, Korean pear, greens, nori chips, and prawn chips $25 $24 HAMACHI YUZU CRUDO Market fresh yellowtail, gochugaru vinaigrette, yuzu-infused olive oil, pickled radish $24 $24 ASPARASCIUTTO Crispy asparagus, dehydrated prosciutto, lightly sauteed & seasoned scallion ribbons $24 Vegetable - $17 CRISPY DUMPLINGS Crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside. Choice of: Vegetable - $17 Pork & Kimchi - $18 $16 CORN CHEESE Sweet corn in a savory melted cheese sauce, spicy fried cauliflower, in a cast iron skillet $16 $17 CRISPY MUSHROOMS Fried shitake, king oyster and oyster mushrooms, yuzu kosho mayo, gochujang sauce, & pickled radish $17 $17 SEOUL SLIDERS A Korean take on the 'NYC deli classic chopped cheese', OR our famous Korean fried chicken sandwich with ranch slaw & pickles. *Both options are recommended with our house potato chips or fries $17 SEOUL FOOD $52 GALBI JJIM Tender, braised short rib served over parsnip puree, chimichurri drizzle, & microgreens $52 $36 BOSSAM Slow-cooked pork belly served with lettuce wraps, house ssamjangg sauce & radish kimchi $36 $35 CAST IRON BULGOGI Tender brisket in a traditional Korean marinade with mushrooms, carrots, chives, and caramelized onions, grilled and served on cast iron $35 $38 BRANZINO In a decadent lobster bisque, grilled until skin is crispy, topped with wasabi tobiko and bean sprouts $38 $32 SPICY BABY OCTOPUS & DUBU PORK Thinly sliced, spicy marinated pork bellY, pork shoulder, and baby octopus sauteed with onions and scallions and served on a sizzling cast iron with slices of firm tofu $32 $26 SEAFOOD TOFU STEW Seafood & silken tofu in a dashi broth, jidori egg, crown daisy, stewed in a cast iron pot, choose from three levels of spiciness $26 BAP & NOODLES - BIBIMBAP Sautéed carrots, spinach, zucchini, shitake mushrooms, bean sprouts, cucumber, fried Jidori egg, & nori puree. Choice of: - Mushrooms (v) - $22 Spicy Pork - $24 Bulgogi - $25 $22 JAJANGMYEON A traditional noodle dish with sauteed onions in Korean gravy and a soft-boiled tea egg $22 $27 SASHIMI DUPBAP Wild-caught Hamachi and salmon over sesame-seasoned rice bowl w/ seasonal greens $27 $22 JAPCHAE Sweet potato noodles, lightly stir fried carrots, shimeji mushrooms, onions, red and green chilis $22 add bulgogi or spicy pork $2 $23 BURRATA TTEOKBOKKI Spicy Korean rice cakes, spicy sausages, scallion & fish cakes in a traditional creamy, sweet and spicy pepper-based sauce $23 SIDES $14 SESAME TOFU SALAD (v) $14 $3 PURPLE WILD RICE $3 $12 SHISHITO PEPPERS $12 $4 NAPA / RADISH / CUCUMBER KIMCHI $4 $8 HOUSE FRIES $8 DESSERT $11 HOMEMADE BLACK SESAME ICE CREAM A crowd favorite $11 $12 MATCHA PANNA COTTA With sesame brittle; a new signature dessert $12 $11 MANGO YUZU CAKE An airy mousse cake dressed and infused with mango & yuzu cream $11
